hero.title: Make Dictation Simple and Fun
hero.subtitle: AI Voice · OCR Recognition · Stroke Animation
hero.description: A dictation learning app designed for primary school students, supporting Chinese and English with AI voice playback, OCR text recognition, HK4762 dictionary, and stroke animations.

features.title: Powerful Features for Easy Learning
features.subtitle: Comprehensive support for your dictation learning needs
features.ocrDesc: Take photos or select images to automatically recognize text and quickly create dictations
features.ttsDesc: Supports Cantonese, Mandarin, and English with adjustable speed, repetition, and intervals
features.dictionaryDesc: Features 4762 common Chinese characters with stroke animations, pronunciations, and word learning
features.reviewDesc: Three review modes: cards, list, and strokes, with support for marking mastered words
features.cloudDesc: After logging in, all dictations are automatically backed up to the cloud for seamless multi-device access
features.freeDesc: Core features are free forever with no subscription required for full experience

questions.question: What are the limitations of the free version?
questions.answer: The free version includes all core features but displays ads. Subscribe to remove ads and enjoy Azure AI premium voice quality.

questions.question: Which languages are supported?
questions.answer: Supports Traditional Chinese (Cantonese), Simplified Chinese (Mandarin), and English.

questions.question: How do I cancel my subscription?
questions.answer: You can cancel anytime in the subscription management section of App Store or Google Play. Your subscription will stop at the end of the current billing cycle.

questions.question: Where is my data stored?
questions.answer: Local data is stored on your device. After logging in, it automatically syncs to Firebase cloud. Your data is secure and private.

questions.question: Can I use it on multiple devices?
questions.answer: Yes! After logging in with the same account, all dictation data will automatically sync across different devices.
